about_the_game:
The freelance Handyman is here AGAIN!


One day, he received an usual repair task and headed to the client's house. After fixing the toilet and conducting a flush test, the toilet emitted a radiant glow, sucking him into a mysterious portal.

Upon opening his eyes, he found himself in a village in a different world. A woman approached him, saying, "You've finally arrived... The legendary handyman, is it you?


In this realm, the Handyman must take on various odd jobs to make ends meet.
Whether it's assisting at the blacksmith's forge, serving as a waiter in the tavern, helping nuns organize shelves in the church, and more. But that's not all – he even finds himself accompanying adventurers on monster-slaying quests!


The handyman works at the bar, assisting catgirl, all the while providing special "services" on the side.


Doesn't have fighting skill but is willing to take damages?


The game offers unique and independent storylines for each girl, along with distinct mini-games related to their respective occupations, playful interactions, intimate scenes, and large-scale CG illustrations. As the affection level reaches a certain point, players can unlock special "corruption" modes for an added dimension to the gameplay experience.


To improve your character's abilities, in addition to purchasing props in shops and mystery shops, you can also unlock new functions and gain skill points through the "sexy energy" that is regularly turned over to the succubus!

Try to conquer all the characters and find a way back to the real world?!


You get to buy various items in the shop


You need to “pay off” to the succubus on a weekly basis LOL!



Tavern's Signature Maid - Cat-Eared, Sunny Girl
Enjoys drinking; often suggests meeting for a drink after work.
When she gets heavily intoxicated, she tends to get a bit frisky.


Blacksmith Shop keeper - Mrs. Minotaur
Her husband (The Minotaur) who is obsessed with blacksmithing and mining.
Despite being a married lady, she experiences unfulfilled desires with no outlet..


Adventurer - Silver-Haired Elf
Proud and ill-tempered, she has difficulty finding teammates due to her personality.
Possesses lustful markings; becomes stronger when in a state of arousal.


Curious about the taboo of sexuality- Nun
Discovers a stash of erotic literature while organizing the library.
Occasionally writes confessional diaries expressing her forbidden desires.


Mysterious Origin - Succubus
In order to meet her standards for absorbing energy, She threatened the Handyman to help her, the Handyman has to "interactive" with various girls, the succubus "absorbs" the lustful energy from him afterwards

content_descriptors.notes:
Please notice:

This game contains nudity and sexual content, which included:
* Seminude and nude 2D graphics
* Animated sex acts (pixelated style)
* Sex act sence (CG Art)
* Sexually suggestive contact
* Alchohal
* NTR

All character depicted are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
The freelance Handyman is here AGAIN!


One day, he received an usual repair task and headed to the client's house. After fixing the toilet and conducting a flush test, the toilet emitted a radiant glow, sucking him into a mysterious portal.

Upon opening his eyes, he found himself in a village in a different world. A woman approached him, saying, "You've finally arrived... The legendary handyman, is it you?


In this realm, the Handyman must take on various odd jobs to make ends meet.
Whether it's assisting at the blacksmith's forge, serving as a waiter in the tavern, helping nuns organize shelves in the church, and more. But that's not all – he even finds himself accompanying adventurers on monster-slaying quests!


The handyman works at the bar, assisting catgirl, all the while providing special "services" on the side.


Doesn't have fighting skill but is willing to take damages?


The game offers unique and independent storylines for each girl, along with distinct mini-games related to their respective occupations, playful interactions, intimate scenes, and large-scale CG illustrations. As the affection level reaches a certain point, players can unlock special "corruption" modes for an added dimension to the gameplay experience.


To improve your character's abilities, in addition to purchasing props in shops and mystery shops, you can also unlock new functions and gain skill points through the "sexy energy" that is regularly turned over to the succubus!

Try to conquer all the characters and find a way back to the real world?!


You get to buy various items in the shop


You need to “pay off” to the succubus on a weekly basis LOL!

Enjoys drinking; often suggests meeting for a drink after work.
When she gets heavily intoxicated, she tends to get a bit frisky.

Her husband (The Minotaur) who is obsessed with blacksmithing and mining.
Despite being a married lady, she experiences unfulfilled desires with no outlet..

name: Handyman Fantasy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4460
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Handyman accidently travels to a different world! While juggling multiple jobs at the adventurer's guild, blacksmith shop and more, he also had to find time to serve the ladies, Additionally, he had to regularly submit his essence to his superior, the "Succubus" to meet performance demands...
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Korean
